CustomField.description: Select this to enable submission comment 1 for this step. When enabled, the user will be prompted to enter submission comment 1 using the submission comment 1 label when the request is submitted for approval.
CustomField.inlineHelpText: Select this to enable submission comment 1 for this step. When enabled, the user will be prompted to enter submission comment 1 using the submission comment 1 label when the request is submitted for approval.
CustomField.label: Step Submission Comment 1 Enabled
